title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.1 - Background and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 823.1 - Background and intent

State Regulations

This regulation contains requirements applicable to
rehabilitative health and behavioral health services available to
children/youth, up to age twenty-one (21) and their families through the
federal Early Periodic Screening, Diagnostic and Treatment (EPSDT) program in

New York. These services are hereby referred to by the state agencies as

Children and Family Treatment and Support Services (CFTSS). Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
